body.name: JTPTU 14 Inch Bed Frame Twin Size,Heavy Duty Metal Twin Bed Frame No Box Spring Needed,Twin Platform Bed Frames Steel Slat Support,Easy Assembly,Noise Free,Non Slip Black Bed Frame Twin Size
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 14 hrs 57 mins
features: 【Heavy Duty & Strong】The twin size bed frame is made of reinforced steel, which is supportive and prevents sinking, making it more stable and bearing more weight. Reinforced construction ensures stability and increases your sleeping comfort without squeaks, and can withstand a weight of 2000 pounds.

【Easy to Assemble】Our bed frame twin is very easy to install. Detailed installation instructions are included in the package, you just need to follow the steps in the manual, which can be installed in a short time.

【Noise-Free】High stability of the twin size metal bed frame without any squeaking noise. The legs of this 14 inch twin bed platform frame have matching rubber feet to prevent noise and floor scratches.

【Under Bed Storage】Oversized underbed storage adds storage capacity to the bedroom. Twin Size bed frame has 12 inches of clearance under, providing you with plenty of storage space, and is easy to clean to keep your room tidy.
【No Box Spring Needed】Durable bed frame twin size steel slats support provides excellent support for your box springs and foam mattresses( No included, you need to buy them separately ).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's exactly what they say it is and what it does it's easy to put together OMG I am so happy don't have to worry about a box spring listening to that noise when you get up and down it's me and my husband and the other part that I love is that you can put stuff underneath in store if you don't have enough storage space in the closet which is awesome it's strong sturdy and my husband's a big guy meaning not big big but he's tall you know he's 5'9 and weighs 255 and I'll tell you you can't hear nothing it is so sturdy I love it I definitely definitely recommend to say anybody and you know what's the best part of all this is it didn't break the bank cuz you know the economy the way things are we all trying to survive so for the price it was perfect the price was right and it's very very sturdy and easy to put together 1 2 3 you know so I definitely definitely recommend this I'm very pleased with my product or should I say lol with my queen size bed frame I just I'm sitting on it right now and it's so comfortable no more box spring bye-bye box springs all you have to worry about is just the mattress Amen to that okay so I hope this will help anybody who's thinking of purchasing it go for it you will not be disappointed. Thank you and Happy New years to everybody.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It is amazing for the price!
reviews.reviewText: We purchased the King Size 18”. I wasn’t sure if this frame would *actually* be good quality or not due to reviews. Super glad I took the risk. It was a happy surprise to find it made of good quality & durable materials. It is secure, but very easy to set up. I especially love the underside storage ability due to the fact that there truly is 18” under the frame to work with. Great Bed! (Also,… haven’t noticed any noses or loud creaks thus far!)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This frame is very durable, very easy to put together and I love that it’s tall enough to allow storage underneath! Doesn’t creak and doesn’t budge. Great for the cost!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assembly and sturdy with lots of under bed storage
reviews.reviewText: The assembly was really easy and fast. I did run into having one bolt that had a defect in the threads and I contacted the seller. They contacted me back and were very accommodating. It is steady and would buy it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought this bed frame for the height and because it said it was a 'noise-free' frame. Well lemme tell you what, this sucker is louder than cat getting its tail shut in a door, more noisy than a child playing with an air horn, and as disruptive as a freight train rolling through a small town, blowing its whistle all crazy.EVERY little move, any time you roll over, or sit down on it, this bed frame is unbelievably loud. So much that i had to return it.If you're an adult who enjoys a little 'roll-in-the-hay' with your partner, this frame is so loud that you'll have your neighbors leaving post it notes on your front door, asking you to tone it down a bit. (True story 🤷🏼‍♀️😉)Frame is also not sturdy, the only cool thing about it, is the height if it. Pretty well off the ground so you can stuff a bunch of crap under it which is nice.Would not recommend buying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I put this under my sons loft bed when my kids decided they wanted to share a room , it was easy to put together and sturdy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely easy to put together and very sturdy!. Everything come with it, I figured something would be missing however every nut and bolt was there!!Some of the frame is bent and uneven.. that's the only some what of a bad thing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: No noises so far..feels very firm and sturdy...sits tall so storage underneath is a most !!Unbeatable price!
